prodInfo.title: Boats that we purchase
prodInfo.text: across all states in the U.S.

contentStep1.stepText: Shoot us a picture or the details on any messaging app

contentStep2.stepText: Schedule an in-office sales appointment or request an appraiser to visit your home

contentStep3.stepText: Receive an instant payout in the form that's convenient for you

need-docs.title: To sell your watercraft, you will need:

docs.title: Vessel title or registration (clear and in your name)
Valid driver's license or state-issued ID

need-docs.need-docs-asq: Additional paperwork will be required if the watercraft is:

listAsq.title: Credited:
listAsq.content:
• Loan payoff information
  • Account number and lender's contact information

listAsq.title: Corporate:
listAsq.content:
• Articles of incorporation or business license
  • Letter authorizing the sale on company letterhead
  • Employer Identification Number (EIN)

list.title: We buy watercraft in any condition
Trade-In available (exchange for a new watercraft)
We offer higher prices than our competitors
We operate in all U.S. states
We handle complex cases (Collateral, Loans, After Accident)

feedback.content: Sold my fishing yacht to these professionals. They were knowledgeable about marine vessels and offered a competitive price. The transaction was smooth, and they handled all the paperwork efficiently. A trustworthy service for boat owners.
feedback.name: George H.

feedback.content: These guys bought my outboard motor in Miami. The offer was fair, and they were flexible with pickup times. Only gave 4 stars because the initial response was a bit slow, but overall a good experience.
feedback.name: Linda F.

feedback.content: Needed to sell my inflatable boat quickly, and these folks came through! Their offer was reasonable, and they picked it up the same day. No hassle, no fuss. Perfect for when you need a quick sale.
feedback.name: Mark D.

listAsq.title: What types of watercraft do you purchase?
listAsq.content: Our company specializes in acquiring various types of watercraft, including yachts, motorboats, sailboats, personal watercraft, fishing vessels, outboard motors, kayaks, inflatable boats, and others. We consider all makes and models.

listAsq.title: How do you determine a boat's value?
listAsq.content: We offer a streamlined online valuation process for your convenience. Simply contact us through any of our messaging platforms (Telegram, WhatsApp, Facebook Messenger) or social networks (Instagram, Facebook) and provide photos along with a brief description (including specifications, details, and modifications). Within 5-7 minutes, you'll receive a competitive offer and a step-by-step plan for a quick sale.

listAsq.title: Do you buy damaged boats?
listAsq.content: Yes, we are prepared to make an offer on watercraft in any condition.

listAsq.title: How does the payment process work?
listAsq.content: The final verification occurs during the appraiser's visit. If you accurately disclosed all details during the initial assessment via messenger, the price typically remains unchanged upon inspection. Payment is processed immediately following this step.

listAsq.title: Can I sell a financed boat?
listAsq.content:
Yes, our company is interested in acquiring watercraft that have been financed through credit or leasing arrangements. We are prepared to consider:
  • Financed watercraft: at any stage of the loan repayment process.
  • Leased watercraft: both those still under active lease agreements and those that have completed their lease terms.

listAsq.title: Do you operate throughout the entire United States?
listAsq.content: While our network doesn't currently cover the entire United States, we are interested in working with customers from various regions and are willing to arrange pickup of the watercraft if necessary. Please note that for more distant locations, the waiting time for our appraiser's arrival may increase by 1-2 days. We strive to provide quality service to every customer, regardless of location.
